name: safetnet-monorepo
description: Safe T Net - Security Management System

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: if [ ! -d 'SafeTNet/venv' ]; then cd SafeTNet && python3 -m venv venv; fi && cd SafeTNet && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd SafeTNet && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver 8000
